channel.title: OpenFoundry - Recently Added Listings - 除錯/編輯器

item.title: Pydb
item.description:
Pydb is an expanded version of the Python debugger loosely based on the gdb command set and the stock Python debugger. It also has all of the features found in an earlier version of pydb.py that was distributed with the debugger GUI.

Platform:Cross platform(except windows);                License:GNU General Public License(GPL)

Reference:https://bashdb.sourceforge.net/pydb/
item.author: dio

item.title: PyPE
item.description:
PyPE (Python Programmers Editor) was written in order to offer a lightweight but powerful editor for those of you who think emacs is too much and idle is too little. Syntax highlighting is included out of the box, as is multiple open documents via tabs.

Platform:Linux(Ubuntu,Kubuntu, and Fedora Core 5);               License:GNU General Public License(GPL)

Reference:https://sourceforge.net/projects/pype/
item.author: dio
